newsitem.title: USA: Consol Capital names new chairman.
newsitem.headline: Consol Capital names new chairman.

text.p: Consolidated Capital of North America Inc said on Wednesday its board of director had resigned and a new board was named with Thompson Rogers as chairman.

Consolidated said its board and its existing officers had resigned pursuant to the completion of a series of transactions through which the majority of the voting stock of Consolidated was issued to Stone Pine Colorado, LLC, the company said.
Rogers is a general partner of Stone Pine Capital LLC, a private investment company.
Consolidated said Peter Damisch had been named president.
It also said it had completed a transaction whereby Angeles Metal Trim Co, a private metal fabrication company, became a wholly owned subsidiary of Consolidated.
